comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] There is something wrong with your Flickrmail - it might be going to a dead email or being rejected as spam ...

Re: The Book -100 Stories

attn Penny & Nicole,

Yes, thank you, it arrived and is much appreciated.

I have written / replied FOUR times about this via flickrmail - for some reason you are not getting these messages.  And you are thinking I am very rude!  Quite right!

Bestest

beachcomberaustralia

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Copied AGAIN here (I'll delete all this later) ....

" BIG THANK YOU ...

 Dear Penny & Nicole,

Thinking you are perhaps not getting my replies via Flickrmail, so here is a new one with copies of previous thank yous ... BIG THANK YOU ...

Hi Penny & Nicole,

I did and I love it. How dreadful that you did not get my Flickr mail of 9/10/12 - you must think me terribly rude!

Copied here -

BIG THANK YOU ...

Dear Penny, Nicole and the ANMM Curatorial Team,

Many thanks for sending the wonderful 100 Stories book; it was very kind of you all (especially signing it), and I am already enjoying reading it. And the charming card is of great interest because an uncle used to pilot for BEA including Malta. What a generous thought and much appreciated. I do enjoy your Flickr postings and my 2 cents might add up to something one day.

Coincidently I have just started volunteer work as a watchkeeper at the Mid North Coast Maritime Museum here in Port Macquarie. The AMAZING thing is that they allowed Google Street View INSIDE the two Pilot's Cottages, and anyone can have a sticky-beak. I am not sure if this is a first for a museum or not. Here is the link - x , or just search in GoogleMaps for "mid north coast maritime museum" and click on the photo at left. Google are coming to your home next ... !

Again, many thanks for the book - it is a lovely gift.

Best wishes to you all, and keep posting on Flickr.

M a r k 
beachcomberaustralia 

"

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
I think I might have the answer  ...  my previous messages had a shortened googleMaps hyperlink which Flickr normally rejects with a warning,  ... but there was no warning so the mail was not sent.

Clear as mud!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thank YOU Beachcomber! We have passed your message onto the curatorial team. Your input has been invaluable so far. Re google street view - THAT IS AMAZING! You can even read the captions on some of the displays! (Bell rope made by Barry O'Driscoll I'm looking at you)
